price: 5. Les vertueux boiront dans une coupe dont la mixture sera d’un camphre
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
